artist: Artist: Jeffrey Morin; Author: Catherine Vaucher , et al.; Publisher: Sailor Boy Press, Stevens Point, Wisconsin
creditline: Gift of the Print and Drawing Council
description: handmade paper; housed in folded box
text: This intimate, handcrafted artist's book features a collection of observations on dancers and their bodies made by various dancers and choreographers. Morin uses computer modified figurative drawings, typographical abstractions, and folded, three-dimensional paper collages (pop-ups) in establishing an eclectic visual dialogue with a series of prose excerpts chosen by Catherine Vaucher. The book's resemblance to a private journal or diary underscores the frequently personal nature of the text.
title: Body Dance
